response.overview: Gorgeous Slovakian blonde Adriana Sweet had good intentions when she started to clean out her closet, but sometimes she finds it tough to let go of her clothing. Some things she keeps for sentimental reasons – like the fishnet pantyhose she wore on her best date ever. Others she’s holding onto just in case, or just because – like the red merry widow she got as a gift and hated – but finds herself kinda liking when she finally tries it on. Maybe she needs a friend with an objective eye to tell her what to keep and what to toss in the trash. So, what’s her style? Latex leggings and a cute black bralette? Or that sassy lace-up teddy she forgot she owned? Imagine you get to pick the clothes she tries on next, and then say what stays and what goes. Just be warned – as she feels a tight outfit clinging to her stunning body, she may get a little… distracted. But maybe you’ll get to see that too…
response.title: Voyeur 2
